name: chatterbox-tts
description: Zero-shot voice cloning text-to-speech for Claude Code. Speaks notifications aloud and provides on-demand TTS with your cloned voice. Optimized for Apple Silicon MPS acceleration.
shortDescription: Voice cloning TTS for Claude notifications

requirements.gpu: Apple Silicon MPS or NVIDIA CUDA (optional, CPU fallback available)

features.name: Voice Cloning
features.description: Clone any voice from a 5-15 second audio sample

features.name: MPS Acceleration
features.description: 3-4x faster inference on Apple Silicon GPUs

commands.name: /speak
commands.description: Generate and play speech from text

changelog.0.2.0: Smart notifications: speaks actual Claude messages instead of generic alerts, LLM formatting via Haiku for natural speech
changelog.0.1.0: Initial release with MPS support, voice cloning, and notification hooks
